views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9.2, 10, 11 and 12

DarkNotes Gives the Opportunity to Get the Dark Mode for your Notes Application!

The Tweak is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository with also the adding of The Preferences Bundles (it’s still in Work in Progress by the way).

See Screenshots below.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak!

Configure options from Settings.

Thanks @karimouni24 for testing.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.4 - Added support for arm64e/A12. Only Tested on iOS 10-12. Older Versions Should Avoid on updating (thanks Jonas for testing). Version 1.0.3
- Fixes:
The StatusBar Items are now Set All to White for a better Readability.
The Background of iCloud Notes are now Set to Gray for a better Readability.

- New Feature:
Added the option to Hide the Buttons Bar in iCloud Notes (thanks patch by @albyvar25).


Version 1.0.2
- Fixes:
The Search Bar Input and inside Notes Text are now Set to White for a better Readability. I’m working to set the Same also to the iCloud Notes.
Code Bit Cleaned.

- New Feature:
Added the option to Hide the Date Labels in All Notes.
